original:
There are some nasty Digimon at
Angler Tunnel...
Please hurry and bring them back...
I'm counting on you.
translation:
There are some nasty Digimon at
Angler Tunnel...
Please hurry and bring them back...
I'm counting on you.

original:
Is that so...
They've grown up so much...
I guess I can't treat them like
children forever, huh?
Thanks, ^P.
I'll continue to watch over them.
Here is your reward for taking on
this request.
translation:
Is that so...
They've grown up so much...
I guess I can't treat them like
children forever, huh?
Thanks, ^P.
I'll continue to watch over them.
Here is your reward for taking on
this request.

original:
Still... To grow that strong simply 
through rivalry...
Rivals truly are very important,
aren't they?
translation:
Still... To grow that strong simply 
through rivalry...
Rivals truly are very important,
aren't they?

original:
Hm?
You met with Andromon??
Oh? Andromon wants us to
make up and be friends again??
Well, if Puttmon apologizes,
then I'll forgive them.
Okay, I'll wait inside for that
apology. Bye bye!
translation:
Hm?
You met with Andromon??
Oh? Andromon wants us to
make up and be friends again??
Well, if Puttmon apologizes,
then I'll forgive them.
Okay, I'll wait inside for that
apology. Bye bye!

original: Puttmon will say sorry, right??
translation: Puttmon will say sorry, right??

original:
Bounce bounce... 
What is it?
Andromon is worried?
Really??
Then I'll go home, once Gigimon
apologizes to me.
I'll wait for that apology inside.
See you later!
translation:
Bounce bounce... 
What is it?
Andromon is worried?
Really??
Then I'll go home, once Gigimon
apologizes to me.
I'll wait for that apology inside.
See you later!

original: Gigimon will apologize, right??
translation: Gigimon will apologize, right??

original:
Good day, ^P.

I recently received a letter from
Monzaemon.
However, I got careless and lost
the letter while I was playing...
I'm in trouble...
I don't remember the contents...
I wrote a letter requesting a new
letter,
So could you please deliver this to
Monzaemon at Task Canyon?
translation:
Good day, ^P.

I recently received a letter from
Monzaemon.
However, I got careless and lost
the letter while I was playing...
I'm in trouble...
I don't remember the contents...
I wrote a letter requesting a new
letter,
So could you please deliver this to
Monzaemon at Task Canyon?

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Request Letter A
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Request Letter A

original:
Monzaemon is pretty careless, too.

If only I could remember the 
contents of the letter...
Please pass this letter onto
Monzaemon at Task Canyon.
translation:
Monzaemon is pretty careless, too.

If only I could remember the 
contents of the letter...
Please pass this letter onto
Monzaemon at Task Canyon.

original:
Welcome back, ^P.

Oh! A reply from Monzaemon??
Thank you! I'll read it right away!
translation:
Welcome back, ^P.

Oh! A reply from Monzaemon??
Thank you! I'll read it right away!

original:
Handed over Key Item
Reply Letter
translation:
Handed over Key Item
Reply Letter

original:
Hm, hmmm...
I see... I see...
Oh, right, I haven't given you my
thanks yet, ^P.
Please, take this.
translation:
Hm, hmmm...
I see... I see...
Oh, right, I haven't given you my
thanks yet, ^P.
Please, take this.

original:
It'd be more reliable if we talked 
directly rather than using letters...
translation:
It'd be more reliable if we talked 
directly rather than using letters...

original:
What is it?
A letter from ExTyrannomon?
Let me see...
translation:
What is it?
A letter from ExTyrannomon?
Let me see...

original:
Handed over Key Item
Request Letter A
translation:
Handed over Key Item
Request Letter A

original:
...Oh no!

I opened the letter so eagerly, 
I accidently tore it up!
This isn't good...
I can't read the contents like this...
...Oh, I know!

I'll have Pandamon in Task 
Canyon fix the letter!
I'll just write a request letter to
Pandamon...
Here! Take this!
translation:
...Oh no!

I opened the letter so eagerly, 
I accidently tore it up!
This isn't good...
I can't read the contents like this...
...Oh, I know!

I'll have Pandamon in Task 
Canyon fix the letter!
I'll just write a request letter to
Pandamon...
Here! Take this!

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Request Letter B
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Request Letter B

original:
I'm sure Pandamon can fix this
letter!
translation:
I'm sure Pandamon can fix this
letter!

original:
Oh-ho? A reply from Pandamon
has arrived!
Let's see, let's see...
translation:
Oh-ho? A reply from Pandamon
has arrived!
Let's see, let's see...

original:
Handed over Key Item
Request Letter C
translation:
Handed over Key Item
Request Letter C

original:
W-what the?! My hand slipped and
the letter fell into a puddle!
Hmmm... I can't read the letter
like this... What a mess...
Hey, sorry about this, but...

Could you get a new letter with the
same contents from Pandamon?
I'll write another request letter.
Here, take this.
translation:
W-what the?! My hand slipped and
the letter fell into a puddle!
Hmmm... I can't read the letter
like this... What a mess...
Hey, sorry about this, but...

Could you get a new letter with the
same contents from Pandamon?
I'll write another request letter.
Here, take this.

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Request Letter D
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Request Letter D

original:
I can't remember the contents...
What did it say, again...?
translation:
I can't remember the contents...
What did it say, again...?

original:
Oh! ^P!
Is that Pandamon's reply letter?!
But it's no longer necessary!

I remembered the contents of the
letter I gave to ExTyrannomon!
Give me a minute,
I'll write a reply right away!
Also, you no longer need that
request letter, so I'll keep it.
Here, this is my reply for
ExTyrannomon.
translation:
Oh! ^P!
Is that Pandamon's reply letter?!
But it's no longer necessary!

I remembered the contents of the
letter I gave to ExTyrannomon!
Give me a minute,
I'll write a reply right away!
Also, you no longer need that
request letter, so I'll keep it.
Here, this is my reply for
ExTyrannomon.

original:
Handed over Key Item
Request Letter E
translation:
Handed over Key Item
Request Letter E

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Reply Letter
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Reply Letter

original:
Go deliver that letter to 
ExTyrannomon.
I'm counting on you.
translation:
Go deliver that letter to 
ExTyrannomon.
I'm counting on you.

original:
I'm not senile yet!
I still remember!
Go deliver that letter to 
ExTyrannomon.
translation:
I'm not senile yet!
I still remember!
Go deliver that letter to 
ExTyrannomon.

original:
A letter from Monzaemon??
I wonder what's the problem...?
translation:
A letter from Monzaemon??
I wonder what's the problem...?

original:
Handed over Key Item
Request Letter B
translation:
Handed over Key Item
Request Letter B

original:
Oh no! Damn it!
I absent-mindedly tore it up!
This is no good...
I can't read it like this...
Hey you... Sorry about this, but...

Could you ask Monzaemon to send
me another letter?
I'll write a letter of apology, too.
Okay, here, take this.
translation:
Oh no! Damn it!
I absent-mindedly tore it up!
This is no good...
I can't read it like this...
Hey you... Sorry about this, but...

Could you ask Monzaemon to send
me another letter?
I'll write a letter of apology, too.
Okay, here, take this.

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Request Letter C
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Request Letter C

original:
Give that letter to Monzaemon.
I'm counting on you!
translation:
Give that letter to Monzaemon.
I'm counting on you!

original:
A reply from Monzaemon, huh?
Give it to me!
translation:
A reply from Monzaemon, huh?
Give it to me!

original:
Handed over Key Item
Request Letter D
translation:
Handed over Key Item
Request Letter D

original:
Oh no! Damn it!
The letter got dirty!
I was doing calligraphy until now...
So I smudged the writing...
Hmmm... This isn't good...
I can't read it like this...
What should I do?
Can you send one more letter?
translation:
Oh no! Damn it!
The letter got dirty!
I was doing calligraphy until now...
So I smudged the writing...
Hmmm... This isn't good...
I can't read it like this...
What should I do?
Can you send one more letter?

original: ...Just one more.
translation: ...Just one more.

original: What?? I'm tired...
translation: What?? I'm tired...

original:
Don't be like that!
Just one more time, please!
translation:
Don't be like that!
Just one more time, please!

original:
Thank you!
I'm counting on you!
translation:
Thank you!
I'm counting on you!

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Request Letter E
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Request Letter E

original:
You're a great person, you know?
Say hi to Monzaemon for me!
translation:
You're a great person, you know?
Say hi to Monzaemon for me!

original:
^P, it seems like 
Dracmon's at it again...
Seems they've stolen DigiPlates
from various Digimon...
Could you look into this problem?
Sorry for bothering you.
Dracmon should be at Access 
Glacier.
Thank you!
translation:
^P, it seems like 
Dracmon's at it again...
Seems they've stolen DigiPlates
from various Digimon...
Could you look into this problem?
Sorry for bothering you.
Dracmon should be at Access 
Glacier.
Thank you!

original:
Luckily, my DigiPlate hasn't been
stolen.
Apparently the Devil Species are
being targeted, in particular.
Hurry to Access Glacier and teach
Dracmon a lesson.
translation:
Luckily, my DigiPlate hasn't been
stolen.
Apparently the Devil Species are
being targeted, in particular.
Hurry to Access Glacier and teach
Dracmon a lesson.

original:
So Dracmon is just really obsessed
with Digivolving...
Hmmm... I wonder if they're okay?
I have a bad feeling...
But for now, you really helped out!
Thank you!
Here's an expression of my 
gratitude, your reward!
translation:
So Dracmon is just really obsessed
with Digivolving...
Hmmm... I wonder if they're okay?
I have a bad feeling...
But for now, you really helped out!
Thank you!
Here's an expression of my 
gratitude, your reward!

original:
We don't have to be obsessed 
with Digivolving, right? Hmmm...
translation:
We don't have to be obsessed 
with Digivolving, right? Hmmm...

original:
You sure are persistent! Chasing 
me all across the world!
Are you making fun of me because
I can't Digivolve?!
I'm strong as I am, you know!
Guess I'll show you with my claws!
translation:
You sure are persistent! Chasing 
me all across the world!
Are you making fun of me because
I can't Digivolve?!
I'm strong as I am, you know!
Guess I'll show you with my claws!

original:
Ugh... Grrr!
If only I could Digivolve...
Then I'd make everyone become my
follower... I wouldn't be alone...
No matter what I have to do,
I WILL Digivolve...!
Go away, or I'll bite you...!
translation:
Ugh... Grrr!
If only I could Digivolve...
Then I'd make everyone become my
follower... I wouldn't be alone...
No matter what I have to do,
I WILL Digivolve...!
Go away, or I'll bite you...!

original:
I'll beat you when I become the
world's strongest Digimon...!
Go away, or I'll bite you...!
translation:
I'll beat you when I become the
world's strongest Digimon...!
Go away, or I'll bite you...!

original:
Hey, ^P,
I had a brilliant idea!
Tadaaah!

Let's make snow cones over at
Access Glacier!
Isn't it just genius?!
Help me out, ^P!
Go get some Ice Flakes and
Giant Ice right away!
They're over at Access Glacier!
Hurry!
translation:
Hey, ^P,
I had a brilliant idea!
Tadaaah!

Let's make snow cones over at
Access Glacier!
Isn't it just genius?!
Help me out, ^P!
Go get some Ice Flakes and
Giant Ice right away!
They're over at Access Glacier!
Hurry!

original:
What's up? Once you bring the 
items, you can try a cone, too!
The Ice Flakes and Giant Ice are
at Access Glacier!
Find those two items and bring 
them here, please!
translation:
What's up? Once you bring the 
items, you can try a cone, too!
The Ice Flakes and Giant Ice are
at Access Glacier!
Find those two items and bring 
them here, please!

original:
I knew you could do it,
great job ^P!
Just gotta shave the Giant Ice 
with the Ice Flakes...
And with this tool, I'll make a Snow
Cone!
I'll let you know when its done!

Okay, here's your reward,
go ahead and take it!
translation:
I knew you could do it,
great job ^P!
Just gotta shave the Giant Ice 
with the Ice Flakes...
And with this tool, I'll make a Snow
Cone!
I'll let you know when its done!

Okay, here's your reward,
go ahead and take it!

original:
Handed over Key Item
Giant Ice
translation:
Handed over Key Item
Giant Ice

original:
Handed over Key Item
Ice Flakes
translation:
Handed over Key Item
Ice Flakes

original:
First I gotta practice!

Let's start by crushing this Giant
Ice!
translation:
First I gotta practice!

Let's start by crushing this Giant
Ice!

original:
What do you want?
This ice...?
I was also looking for this piece
of ice, earlier, but...
It's simply too big...
Hey, how about we split it?
Hmm... It's pretty hard, but if I
train a little, I can break it!
Have a quick match with me!
translation:
What do you want?
This ice...?
I was also looking for this piece
of ice, earlier, but...
It's simply too big...
Hey, how about we split it?
Hmm... It's pretty hard, but if I
train a little, I can break it!
Have a quick match with me!

original:
Look! The ice broke!
It split right in half!
Alright, I'll take this half, and you
can have the other half.
translation:
Look! The ice broke!
It split right in half!
Alright, I'll take this half, and you
can have the other half.

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Giant Ice
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Giant Ice

original:
Training is the best way you can
manage to break tough things!
That's a good lesson to remember!
translation:
Training is the best way you can
manage to break tough things!
That's a good lesson to remember!

original:
With this ice, I can keep my
noodles cold!
translation:
With this ice, I can keep my
noodles cold!

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Ice Flakes
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Ice Flakes

original:
U-ummm... ^P...
Could you listen to my request...?
I was in a state of despair earlier,
and while at Wizard Temple...
I accidently threw away three 
different rings...
But now I really need to get them
back...
Please! Can you help me find 
those rings!
translation:
U-ummm... ^P...
Could you listen to my request...?
I was in a state of despair earlier,
and while at Wizard Temple...
I accidently threw away three 
different rings...
But now I really need to get them
back...
Please! Can you help me find 
those rings!

original:
I brought ruby, onyx and diamond
rings to Wizard Temple...
And then I just... tossed them 
away... just like that...
translation:
I brought ruby, onyx and diamond
rings to Wizard Temple...
And then I just... tossed them 
away... just like that...

original:
Oh, ^P...
W-welcome back...
You've collected all three of the
rings I lost...!
With these, I can make a brand
new ring!
Thanks, ^P...!
This is a token of my gratitude!
translation:
Oh, ^P...
W-welcome back...
You've collected all three of the
rings I lost...!
With these, I can make a brand
new ring!
Thanks, ^P...!
This is a token of my gratitude!

original:
Handed over Key Item
Ruby Ring
translation:
Handed over Key Item
Ruby Ring

original:
Handed over Key Item
Onyx Ring
translation:
Handed over Key Item
Onyx Ring

original:
Handed over Key Item
Diamond Ring
translation:
Handed over Key Item
Diamond Ring

original:
N-next time I won't throw my
stuff away in such a huff...
translation:
N-next time I won't throw my
stuff away in such a huff...

original:
Wow!
I picked up something good!
What?
Something wrong??
...It's too late to say 'give it back',
you know...
Alright then... If you beat me, I'll
give them to you!
Here I come!
translation:
Wow!
I picked up something good!
What?
Something wrong??
...It's too late to say 'give it back',
you know...
Alright then... If you beat me, I'll
give them to you!
Here I come!

original:
Hmmm... You're strong!
I surrender! I surrender!
Here, I'll give you the ring.
translation:
Hmmm... You're strong!
I surrender! I surrender!
Here, I'll give you the ring.

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Diamond Ring
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Diamond Ring

original:
I'm not happy about this, but I did
make a promise.
translation:
I'm not happy about this, but I did
make a promise.

original:
If you want to throw anything else
away, just call for me!
translation:
If you want to throw anything else
away, just call for me!

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Ruby Ring
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Ruby Ring

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Onyx Ring
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Onyx Ring

original:
You're here, ^P.
I have something to discuss.
It seems someone's been doing 
bad things using my name...
I can't stay quiet and overlook
something like this.
Please go to Thriller Ruins and
catch that imposter!
translation:
You're here, ^P.
I have something to discuss.
It seems someone's been doing 
bad things using my name...
I can't stay quiet and overlook
something like this.
Please go to Thriller Ruins and
catch that imposter!

original:
It seems some faker is doing evil
things at Thriller Ruins...
Using my name, of all people...!
translation:
It seems some faker is doing evil
things at Thriller Ruins...
Using my name, of all people...!

original:
I see, so the faker turned out to
be Merukimon...
I wanted to teach them a lesson
for what they did, but...
It seems Merukimon is reflecting
on their actions, so it's fine.
I won't pursue this any further.

I appreciate your help,
^P. Please take this.
translation:
I see, so the faker turned out to
be Merukimon...
I wanted to teach them a lesson
for what they did, but...
It seems Merukimon is reflecting
on their actions, so it's fine.
I won't pursue this any further.

I appreciate your help,
^P. Please take this.

original:
Seems like the fake me is reflecting
on their actions.
Thank you, ^P.
translation:
Seems like the fake me is reflecting
on their actions.
Thank you, ^P.

original:
Hm? Hey, you! You were staring
at me just then, weren't you?!
Don't lie!
You absolutely were staring!
You're looking for a fake?
And you're saying I'M the fake?!
You incomprehensible fool!
Now I'm annoyed! You'll pay!
translation:
Hm? Hey, you! You were staring
at me just then, weren't you?!
Don't lie!
You absolutely were staring!
You're looking for a fake?
And you're saying I'M the fake?!
You incomprehensible fool!
Now I'm annoyed! You'll pay!

original:
I'm so annoyed!
Why was I the one to lose?!
I'm telling you!
I don't know any fake!
You're completely mistaken!

But I did see someone similar to
me before.
Maybe you're mistaking me for
them?
translation:
I'm so annoyed!
Why was I the one to lose?!
I'm telling you!
I don't know any fake!
You're completely mistaken!

But I did see someone similar to
me before.
Maybe you're mistaking me for
them?

original:
It's not me! I'm telling you, 
you've made a mistake!
translation:
It's not me! I'm telling you, 
you've made a mistake!

original:
I'm WereGarurumon!
Hand over all your coins!
What? You're saying I'm a 
fake WereGarurumon...?
Wahaha! How interesting!
Why don't you try and find out!
translation:
I'm WereGarurumon!
Hand over all your coins!
What? You're saying I'm a 
fake WereGarurumon...?
Wahaha! How interesting!
Why don't you try and find out!

original:
Damn! I can't believe it's a request
from the real WereGarurumon!
I messed up! 
I won't use their name again!
I promise!
So please, spare me!
translation:
Damn! I can't believe it's a request
from the real WereGarurumon!
I messed up! 
I won't use their name again!
I promise!
So please, spare me!

original:
I'll stop pretending to be
WereGarurumon. Let them know.
translation:
I'll stop pretending to be
WereGarurumon. Let them know.

original:
^P...
Please listen to my request...
There's a Digimon that I really
look up to...
I want to borrow the shotgun that
they carry with them...
Their name is Beelzemon,
they live in Angler Tunnel.
Living there must be...
So cool...
^P,
I'm counting on you.
translation:
^P...
Please listen to my request...
There's a Digimon that I really
look up to...
I want to borrow the shotgun that
they carry with them...
Their name is Beelzemon,
they live in Angler Tunnel.
Living there must be...
So cool...
^P,
I'm counting on you.

original:
The shotgun that Beelzemon at
Angler Tunnel carries...
That's what I long for...
I'm counting on you, ^P.
translation:
The shotgun that Beelzemon at
Angler Tunnel carries...
That's what I long for...
I'm counting on you, ^P.

original:
This is Beelzemon's...
It's so awesome!
I'll be sure to return this later...!

I'll become a Digimon suited to
carry this shotgun!
^P,
Here's my promised reward.
translation:
This is Beelzemon's...
It's so awesome!
I'll be sure to return this later...!

I'll become a Digimon suited to
carry this shotgun!
^P,
Here's my promised reward.

original:
Handed over Key Item
Spare Gun
translation:
Handed over Key Item
Spare Gun

original:
The Digimon suited for this 
shotgun... Is Beelzemon, for sure.
translation:
The Digimon suited for this 
shotgun... Is Beelzemon, for sure.

original:
You want to borrow my 
shotgun...?
I can lend you my spare gun once
you find it.
However...

I need to test whether you're fit
to entrust the gun to.
translation:
You want to borrow my 
shotgun...?
I can lend you my spare gun once
you find it.
However...

I need to test whether you're fit
to entrust the gun to.

original:
First, find and bring my spare gun
to me.
It's somewhere inside Angler 
Tunnel, I'm sure.
translation:
First, find and bring my spare gun
to me.
It's somewhere inside Angler 
Tunnel, I'm sure.

original:
That's right, this is my spare
shotgun...
My shotgun is my life...

Whether or not you're fit enough 
for me to entrust it to you...
That's the question.
I will test you on that!
translation:
That's right, this is my spare
shotgun...
My shotgun is my life...

Whether or not you're fit enough 
for me to entrust it to you...
That's the question.
I will test you on that!

original:
Very well. I shall lend this to you.
Treasure it, and get going!
translation:
Very well. I shall lend this to you.
Treasure it, and get going!

original:
A shotgun is one's life blood...
Do not forget that.
translation:
A shotgun is one's life blood...
Do not forget that.

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Spare Gun
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Spare Gun

original:
Greetings, ^P!

Today I'd like to introduce you to
my family!
...Is what I'd like to say,
however...
Nobody is here yet...

I'm sure they're somewhere at
Proxy Island,
So could you help find them
and tell them to gather here.
There are four family members
in total. Good luck!
translation:
Greetings, ^P!

Today I'd like to introduce you to
my family!
...Is what I'd like to say,
however...
Nobody is here yet...

I'm sure they're somewhere at
Proxy Island,
So could you help find them
and tell them to gather here.
There are four family members
in total. Good luck!

original:
My family are all on vacation at
Proxy Island.
There are four of them, so make 
sure you find all of them.
translation:
My family are all on vacation at
Proxy Island.
There are four of them, so make 
sure you find all of them.

original:
Thanks, ^P.
So you met with all of them?
I'm happy you were able to
find them all!
Here's your reward,
thanks for helping me.
translation:
Thanks, ^P.
So you met with all of them?
I'm happy you were able to
find them all!
Here's your reward,
thanks for helping me.

original:
Next time, I hope I can gather
everyone together myself!
translation:
Next time, I hope I can gather
everyone together myself!

original:
Oh! Long time no see! Thanks for 
your help back at Loop Swamp!
Uncle Hawkmon is doing well, too!

Hm? Big Bro Buraimon is looking
for me?
Got it! I'll go back together with
everyone after you've found them!
translation:
Oh! Long time no see! Thanks for 
your help back at Loop Swamp!
Uncle Hawkmon is doing well, too!

Hm? Big Bro Buraimon is looking
for me?
Got it! I'll go back together with
everyone after you've found them!

original:
I'm not some lost child!
I'm an adult now, remember?
You're such a worrywart!
translation:
I'm not some lost child!
I'm an adult now, remember?
You're such a worrywart!

original:
Buraimon's looking for me?
Was I supposed to do something...?
Oh, now I remember!
I was supposed to be meeting you!
Well, now I've already met you,
so the mission's complete, huh?
translation:
Buraimon's looking for me?
Was I supposed to do something...?
Oh, now I remember!
I was supposed to be meeting you!
Well, now I've already met you,
so the mission's complete, huh?

original:
I'll meet with everyone else later,
please let them know that.
translation:
I'll meet with everyone else later,
please let them know that.

original:
What?!
Big Bro Buraimon's looking for me?!
That guy can be so inattentive!
Things just don't get through.
^P, was it?
Thanks for coming all this way.
Make sure big bro properly gives
his thanks to you, too.
translation:
What?!
Big Bro Buraimon's looking for me?!
That guy can be so inattentive!
Things just don't get through.
^P, was it?
Thanks for coming all this way.
Make sure big bro properly gives
his thanks to you, too.

original:
Did you tell my other family 
members, too?
You're such a good person!
I'm counting on you!
translation:
Did you tell my other family 
members, too?
You're such a good person!
I'm counting on you!

original:
What's that?
You want something of me?
Oh, you're ^P?
Jeez, that Buraimon...
Asking you to do such a thing,
he can really be a pain...
Thank you for all your trouble.
Let's all meet up together later.
translation:
What's that?
You want something of me?
Oh, you're ^P?
Jeez, that Buraimon...
Asking you to do such a thing,
he can really be a pain...
Thank you for all your trouble.
Let's all meet up together later.

original: Have you already met everyone?
translation: Have you already met everyone?

original:
^P...
This has become quite the problem.
I just received a love letter from
Mummymon...
But I don't like him back...

Why don't I like him?
Because he's just so dry!
I can't stand those kinds of
people! I really can't!
So I've got a favor to ask!

Please go to Graphics Board
Central and say sorry to him for me...
translation:
^P...
This has become quite the problem.
I just received a love letter from
Mummymon...
But I don't like him back...

Why don't I like him?
Because he's just so dry!
I can't stand those kinds of
people! I really can't!
So I've got a favor to ask!

Please go to Graphics Board
Central and say sorry to him for me...

original:
If only he weren't so dry...

Mummymon's waiting over at
Graphics Board Central.
translation:
If only he weren't so dry...

Mummymon's waiting over at
Graphics Board Central.

original:
Welcome back, ^P!

A petition from Mummymon...?
Ummm... I guess I'll take it...
For now, I'll just tell him to start
by exchanging letters...!
Thank you, ^P!
Here's your reward, as promised.
If I run into any other issues,
I'll be sure to come to you!
translation:
Welcome back, ^P!

A petition from Mummymon...?
Ummm... I guess I'll take it...
For now, I'll just tell him to start
by exchanging letters...!
Thank you, ^P!
Here's your reward, as promised.
If I run into any other issues,
I'll be sure to come to you!

original:
Handed over Key Item
Petition
translation:
Handed over Key Item
Petition

original:
But I really can't stand the idea
of being so dry...
Without moisture, I just can't 
survive!
translation:
But I really can't stand the idea
of being so dry...
Without moisture, I just can't 
survive!

original:
A reply from Mermaimon?!
I've been waiting!
Quick, hurry and tell me!
It's a yes, isn't it?! I bet it is!

...It's a no...?
A no?!
That's impossible!
What's the reason?!
I'll force it out of you!
translation:
A reply from Mermaimon?!
I've been waiting!
Quick, hurry and tell me!
It's a yes, isn't it?! I bet it is!

...It's a no...?
A no?!
That's impossible!
What's the reason?!
I'll force it out of you!

original:
It's a no?!
So it really is a no...?!
I need to do something about this!
...But what...?
...I know!
Here, give this to Mermaimon!
translation:
It's a no?!
So it really is a no...?!
I need to do something about this!
...But what...?
...I know!
Here, give this to Mermaimon!

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Petition
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Petition

original:
I believe that this will sway
Mermaimon, but...
I'll leave the details to you,
^P!
translation:
I believe that this will sway
Mermaimon, but...
I'll leave the details to you,
^P!

original:
Wow, ^P!
I'm so awesome!
I thought of an incredible
training menu!
With this, I'll get strong for sure!
You should try it out, too!
First, go meet AncientSphinxmon
over in Shadow Hell!
translation:
Wow, ^P!
I'm so awesome!
I thought of an incredible
training menu!
With this, I'll get strong for sure!
You should try it out, too!
First, go meet AncientSphinxmon
over in Shadow Hell!

original:
You're definitely fit for this
training, too!
Go meet AncientSphinxmon over in 
Shadow Hell!
translation:
You're definitely fit for this
training, too!
Go meet AncientSphinxmon over in 
Shadow Hell!

original:
You have returned!
Amazing!
I'll give you a prize!
translation:
You have returned!
Amazing!
I'll give you a prize!

original:
I'll keep up this training until even
my brain turns to muscle!
translation:
I'll keep up this training until even
my brain turns to muscle!

original:
You have come, I see.

There are three Digimon scattered
throughout Shadow Hell.
Win against all three, 
that is the only rule.
Once you have defeated all three,
report back to me. That is all.
translation:
You have come, I see.

There are three Digimon scattered
throughout Shadow Hell.
Win against all three, 
that is the only rule.
Once you have defeated all three,
report back to me. That is all.

original:
Once you have defeated all three,
report back to me. That is all.
translation:
Once you have defeated all three,
report back to me. That is all.

original:
So you won against all three?
Now that is true strength.
Now I shall test you on how
much you amount to!
Come!
translation:
So you won against all three?
Now that is true strength.
Now I shall test you on how
much you amount to!
Come!

original:
With this, my training is over.
Trust your power and work harder!
That is all.
translation:
With this, my training is over.
Trust your power and work harder!
That is all.

original:
Training is over!
Dismissed!
translation:
Training is over!
Dismissed!

original:
I am here.
Let us fight!
translation:
I am here.
Let us fight!

original:
I lost.
You are strong.
translation:
I lost.
You are strong.

original:
You have defeated all.
Go fight AncientSphinxmon.
translation:
You have defeated all.
Go fight AncientSphinxmon.

original:
What is your dream?!

Training?!
Is it training?!
Then allow me to fulfill your dream!
translation:
What is your dream?!

Training?!
Is it training?!
Then allow me to fulfill your dream!

original:
Has your dream been fulfilled!?
Then let's meet again someday!
translation:
Has your dream been fulfilled!?
Then let's meet again someday!

original: I'll always support you!
translation: I'll always support you!

original:
In a fight, there's a winner, and 
there's a loser.
That's why it's so interesting!
Fight with me!
translation:
In a fight, there's a winner, and 
there's a loser.
That's why it's so interesting!
Fight with me!

original:
You have won. You have gained 
strength by your own hand, alone.
translation:
You have won. You have gained 
strength by your own hand, alone.

original:
You are strong. But
AncientSphinxmon is strong, too.
translation:
You are strong. But
AncientSphinxmon is strong, too.

original:
Hey, ^P,
what do you think about beauty?
Beauty Shampoo is common 
knowledge these days.
But lately, it seems Beauty Soap
is also becoming popular...
It seems it can be found deep
within Task Canyon.
...I'm sure you know what I'm
getting at, don't you?
Please bring me the Beauty
Soap as soon as you can.
translation:
Hey, ^P,
what do you think about beauty?
Beauty Shampoo is common 
knowledge these days.
But lately, it seems Beauty Soap
is also becoming popular...
It seems it can be found deep
within Task Canyon.
...I'm sure you know what I'm
getting at, don't you?
Please bring me the Beauty
Soap as soon as you can.

original:
Beauty Soap is used to help
give you smoother skin.
It seems to be somewhere deep
in Task Canyon.
translation:
Beauty Soap is used to help
give you smoother skin.
It seems to be somewhere deep
in Task Canyon.

original:
Welcome back.
That's the Beauty Soap, isn't it?
What a beautiful color...
Now my skin'll be even smoother...
Hehehe... Thank you so much,
^P.
Here is my thanks, please take it.
translation:
Welcome back.
That's the Beauty Soap, isn't it?
What a beautiful color...
Now my skin'll be even smoother...
Hehehe... Thank you so much,
^P.
Here is my thanks, please take it.

original:
Handed over Key Item
Beauty Soap
translation:
Handed over Key Item
Beauty Soap

original:
If you pay more attention to your
appearance,
I'm sure even you'll become more
lovely, ^P!
translation:
If you pay more attention to your
appearance,
I'm sure even you'll become more
lovely, ^P!

original:
Are you looking for Beauty Soap?
What a coincidence, me too!
It's fine and all, coming here after
hearing such a rumor, but...
When it comes to creating Beauty
Soap, you need some Red Bubbles.
Would you like to search for it,
together?
If we can manage to find it,
I'll share some soap with you!
translation:
Are you looking for Beauty Soap?
What a coincidence, me too!
It's fine and all, coming here after
hearing such a rumor, but...
When it comes to creating Beauty
Soap, you need some Red Bubbles.
Would you like to search for it,
together?
If we can manage to find it,
I'll share some soap with you!

original:
When it comes to creating Beauty
Soap, you need some Red Bubbles!
I'll do the making, so you go search
for some Red Bubbles!
I'm sure you can find some
somewhere on this mountain!
translation:
When it comes to creating Beauty
Soap, you need some Red Bubbles!
I'll do the making, so you go search
for some Red Bubbles!
I'm sure you can find some
somewhere on this mountain!

original:
Kya! This is it! This is it!
You found it!
Alright!
Let's make some soap!
Give me a minute...

.............

Pweh! It's done! With this, 
you'll have lovely beautiful skin!
Here you go, this is your
portion.
translation:
Kya! This is it! This is it!
You found it!
Alright!
Let's make some soap!
Give me a minute...

.............

Pweh! It's done! With this, 
you'll have lovely beautiful skin!
Here you go, this is your
portion.

original:
Handed over Key Item
Red Bubbles
translation:
Handed over Key Item
Red Bubbles

original:
.............

Pweh! It's done! With this, 
you'll have lovely beautiful skin!
Here you go, this is your
portion.
translation:
.............

Pweh! It's done! With this, 
you'll have lovely beautiful skin!
Here you go, this is your
portion.

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Beauty Soap
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Beauty Soap

original:
What? Did you suspect I'd keep
it all to myself?
Of course not!
In the end, I'm the most beautiful!
So don't mind me!
translation:
What? Did you suspect I'd keep
it all to myself?
Of course not!
In the end, I'm the most beautiful!
So don't mind me!

original:
I'll be getting magazine offer
after magazine offer, now! Ehehe!
translation:
I'll be getting magazine offer
after magazine offer, now! Ehehe!

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Red Bubbles
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Red Bubbles

original:
^P...
We've got trouble...
It seems Dracmon's been stealing
Items and Bits...
It looks like he's being instructed
by someone behind the scenes...
Could you go check on him over
at Graphics Board Central?
translation:
^P...
We've got trouble...
It seems Dracmon's been stealing
Items and Bits...
It looks like he's being instructed
by someone behind the scenes...
Could you go check on him over
at Graphics Board Central?

original:
This isn't good...
I'm worried about Dracmon...
Someone saw him over on Graphics
Board Central,
Please go and see what's going on,
^P.
translation:
This isn't good...
I'm worried about Dracmon...
Someone saw him over on Graphics
Board Central,
Please go and see what's going on,
^P.

original:
Welcome back,
^P!
Dracmon was here earlier, and he
dropped off a Blug Plate!
He wants the Plate inserted into
the Tree once it's repaired.
He could have asked you himself,
be he's just not that direct, is he?
Here's a reward from the both
of us.
Thank you very much,
^P.
translation:
Welcome back,
^P!
Dracmon was here earlier, and he
dropped off a Blug Plate!
He wants the Plate inserted into
the Tree once it's repaired.
He could have asked you himself,
be he's just not that direct, is he?
Here's a reward from the both
of us.
Thank you very much,
^P.

original:
Obtained a Bug Plate!
GranDracmon
translation:
Obtained a Bug Plate!
GranDracmon

original:
It seems Dracmon is happy that
you care about him, ^P.
Please continue to support him.
translation:
It seems Dracmon is happy that
you care about him, ^P.
Please continue to support him.

original:
I saw Dracmon earlier.

He said he'd get a DigiPlate from
GranDracmon, but...
I doubt that GranDracmon will give
him one so easily.
Because despite being super 
strong, he's not very nice.
I hope Dracmon doesn't get
shoved around too much...
translation:
I saw Dracmon earlier.

He said he'd get a DigiPlate from
GranDracmon, but...
I doubt that GranDracmon will give
him one so easily.
Because despite being super 
strong, he's not very nice.
I hope Dracmon doesn't get
shoved around too much...

original:
Dracmon said he was meeting 
someone at Graphics Board Central.
translation:
Dracmon said he was meeting 
someone at Graphics Board Central.

original:
Ummm... ^P...
C...can I talk to you...?
H...have you heard the recent 
rumor about a Doppel-Digimon...?
If someone sees a similar looking
Digimon, bad luck will follow...
S...scary, isn't it... But... 
I'm curious about its true identity...
I heard he appears somewhere
in Chrome Mine...
C...Could you go and investigate...?
translation:
Ummm... ^P...
C...can I talk to you...?
H...have you heard the recent 
rumor about a Doppel-Digimon...?
If someone sees a similar looking
Digimon, bad luck will follow...
S...scary, isn't it... But... 
I'm curious about its true identity...
I heard he appears somewhere
in Chrome Mine...
C...Could you go and investigate...?

original:
A mysterious Doppel-Digimon 
somewhere in Chrome Mine...
S...scary, isn't it...
Can you go investigate...?
translation:
A mysterious Doppel-Digimon 
somewhere in Chrome Mine...
S...scary, isn't it...
Can you go investigate...?

original:
Oh... ^P, welcome back...
How'd it go...?
Eh...? The Doppel-Digimon was
Cherubimon...?
B...but I was with Cherubimon
at the time...
We came to the Farm and were
playing together...
I... I'm scared...
Here's your reward...
translation:
Oh... ^P, welcome back...
How'd it go...?
Eh...? The Doppel-Digimon was
Cherubimon...?
B...but I was with Cherubimon
at the time...
We came to the Farm and were
playing together...
I... I'm scared...
Here's your reward...

original:
I... I'm sure that was not the
Cherubimon I know...
I... I'm sure of it!
...But if I'm wrong...
translation:
I... I'm sure that was not the
Cherubimon I know...
I... I'm sure of it!
...But if I'm wrong...

original:
W...we are...
the... same...
translation:
W...we are...
the... same...

original:
Wait, ^P!
I can't stand this any longer!
There's a guy who raids the ruins
at Class Desert!
The ruins' relics are also being
stolen one after the other!
Isn't it terrible?
I can't allow this to continue!
^P! Get the treasures
from Class Desert!
First, find the Jewel Shard and 
the Gold Shard!
If you follow the clues, it should
lead you to the culprit!
translation:
Wait, ^P!
I can't stand this any longer!
There's a guy who raids the ruins
at Class Desert!
The ruins' relics are also being
stolen one after the other!
Isn't it terrible?
I can't allow this to continue!
^P! Get the treasures
from Class Desert!
First, find the Jewel Shard and 
the Gold Shard!
If you follow the clues, it should
lead you to the culprit!

original:
First, find the Jewel Shard and 
the Gold Shard!
If you follow the clues, it should
lead you to the culprit!
They should be in Class Desert!
Please don't forget!
translation:
First, find the Jewel Shard and 
the Gold Shard!
If you follow the clues, it should
lead you to the culprit!
They should be in Class Desert!
Please don't forget!

original:
Welcome back, ^P!
I've been waiting!
And you've managed to bring the
treasure back in one piece!
...I bet you were tempted to take
these treasures for yourself...
...Just kidding!

You, of all people, would never
do something like that!
Right...?

Alright, here's your reward!
Thanks, ^P!
translation:
Welcome back, ^P!
I've been waiting!
And you've managed to bring the
treasure back in one piece!
...I bet you were tempted to take
these treasures for yourself...
...Just kidding!

You, of all people, would never
do something like that!
Right...?

Alright, here's your reward!
Thanks, ^P!

original:
Handed over Key Item
Jewel Shard
translation:
Handed over Key Item
Jewel Shard

original:
Handed over Key Item
Gold Shard
translation:
Handed over Key Item
Gold Shard

original:
Handed over Key Item
Golden Mask
translation:
Handed over Key Item
Golden Mask

original:
With this, I can finally relax!

I knew you could do it, ^P!
I'll be counting on you from now on!
translation:
With this, I can finally relax!

I knew you could do it, ^P!
I'll be counting on you from now on!

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Jewel Shard
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Jewel Shard

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Gold Shard
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Gold Shard

original:
S...say, ^P...
Do you know...?
Only specially selected Tamers
can take this... Special... training.
In addition to being special,
it's also a crash course,
So it's called 'Special Crash
Training'.
It looks like... you were the 
specially chosen Tamer, so...
If you feel like it, how about
trying out this training...?
translation:
S...say, ^P...
Do you know...?
Only specially selected Tamers
can take this... Special... training.
In addition to being special,
it's also a crash course,
So it's called 'Special Crash
Training'.
It looks like... you were the 
specially chosen Tamer, so...
If you feel like it, how about
trying out this training...?

original:
It... It's alright.
You can do it, ^P...
Coronamon is waiting for you at
Palace Laboratory...
S...so, good luck...
translation:
It... It's alright.
You can do it, ^P...
Coronamon is waiting for you at
Palace Laboratory...
S...so, good luck...

original:
Welcome back, ^P...!

^P... Y...you really are
strong after all...
You look... far stronger than before
you took that crash training...
I... I should work harder... too!

H...here is your reward...
Please, take it...
translation:
Welcome back, ^P...!

^P... Y...you really are
strong after all...
You look... far stronger than before
you took that crash training...
I... I should work harder... too!

H...here is your reward...
Please, take it...

original:
M... maybe I'll have Coronamon
train me, too...
translation:
M... maybe I'll have Coronamon
train me, too...

original:
I must also undergo special 
training so I won't lose to you!
Don't forget to go back to the
Farm and give that report, okay?
translation:
I must also undergo special 
training so I won't lose to you!
Don't forget to go back to the
Farm and give that report, okay?

original:
^P!
Hear me out!
Last night while I was staring
at the stars...
I saw something bright zoom
right through the sky!
Could it have possibly been...
A DigiShip?
Maybe another Tamer has come!

It looks like it landed somewhere
on Proxy Island...
You should really go and check
it out!
translation:
^P!
Hear me out!
Last night while I was staring
at the stars...
I saw something bright zoom
right through the sky!
Could it have possibly been...
A DigiShip?
Maybe another Tamer has come!

It looks like it landed somewhere
on Proxy Island...
You should really go and check
it out!

original:
It looks like some sort of DigiShip
came from the sky,
And it landed somewhere on
Proxy Island!
You should really go and check
it out!
translation:
It looks like some sort of DigiShip
came from the sky,
And it landed somewhere on
Proxy Island!
You should really go and check
it out!

original:
Welcome back, ^P!

Huh? It wasn't a DigiShip?
That's a shame...
So it was a false alarm thanks
to Justimon, huh...
In any case, thanks for your
efforts. Here, take this.
translation:
Welcome back, ^P!

Huh? It wasn't a DigiShip?
That's a shame...
So it was a false alarm thanks
to Justimon, huh...
In any case, thanks for your
efforts. Here, take this.

original:
In any case...
He collided with a shooting star...?
Just what kind of training was
that guy doing...?
translation:
In any case...
He collided with a shooting star...?
Just what kind of training was
that guy doing...?

original:
If you've come to see the shooting
stars,
Then I can give you something just
as sparkling and awe-inspiring!
If you want it, you'll have to go
ask SlashAngemon what it is, first.
He's somewhere on Proxy Island.
translation:
If you've come to see the shooting
stars,
Then I can give you something just
as sparkling and awe-inspiring!
If you want it, you'll have to go
ask SlashAngemon what it is, first.
He's somewhere on Proxy Island.

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
??? Fragments
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
??? Fragments

original:
Did a new Tamer come from the
Real World, I wonder...?
translation:
Did a new Tamer come from the
Real World, I wonder...?

original:
Something sparkling...?

Justimon went looking and found
some of these fragments...?
Let me take a look...
Somethings written on them...
It says... 'Justimon'...
translation:
Something sparkling...?

Justimon went looking and found
some of these fragments...?
Let me take a look...
Somethings written on them...
It says... 'Justimon'...

original:
Are these fragments from a
DigiShip...?
translation:
Are these fragments from a
DigiShip...?

original:
Uwaaaaah!
Where is ittttttt?!
Come on! Where is it?!

Yesterday while I was out 
practicing my kicks...
I ended up getting hit by a falling
star, bam!
It broke my precious helmet...

I've been looking for all the
pieces, 
But I haven't managed to find
all of them, yet...
They look like...

JUST LIKE WHAT YOU'VE GOT!

What?
You'll give them back to me?
Whoa! Thank you so much!
I owe you big time!
translation:
Uwaaaaah!
Where is ittttttt?!
Come on! Where is it?!

Yesterday while I was out 
practicing my kicks...
I ended up getting hit by a falling
star, bam!
It broke my precious helmet...

I've been looking for all the
pieces, 
But I haven't managed to find
all of them, yet...
They look like...

JUST LIKE WHAT YOU'VE GOT!

What?
You'll give them back to me?
Whoa! Thank you so much!
I owe you big time!

original:
Handed over Key Item
??? Fragments
translation:
Handed over Key Item
??? Fragments

original:
Boy am I glad I wrote my name
on my helmet!
You look frustrated!
But I'm totally satisfied!
translation:
Boy am I glad I wrote my name
on my helmet!
You look frustrated!
But I'm totally satisfied!

original:
You're late, ^P!
I've been waiting forever!
My shoulders have been aching
something fierce!
But I heard that there are some
good hot springs in Chrome Mine.
Would you go confirm that
rumor for me?
translation:
You're late, ^P!
I've been waiting forever!
My shoulders have been aching
something fierce!
But I heard that there are some
good hot springs in Chrome Mine.
Would you go confirm that
rumor for me?

original:
Hurry, please!

I really want to check out the hot
springs everyone's talking about!
What kind of hot spring is it,
I wonder?!
Geez, hurry up and find out for me,
will you?!
translation:
Hurry, please!

I really want to check out the hot
springs everyone's talking about!
What kind of hot spring is it,
I wonder?!
Geez, hurry up and find out for me,
will you?!

original:
Oh, welcome back!
So you found the hot spring...
And you... brought it back...
right...?
What do you mean you didn't bring
the hot spring back??
I don't believe you!

Could you hurry up and bring back
some Hot Spring Water,
As well as some Bath Salts, 
please?!
translation:
Oh, welcome back!
So you found the hot spring...
And you... brought it back...
right...?
What do you mean you didn't bring
the hot spring back??
I don't believe you!

Could you hurry up and bring back
some Hot Spring Water,
As well as some Bath Salts, 
please?!

original:
Make sure you bring back the
Hot Spring Water and Bath Salts
from the hot spring in Chrome
Mine, got it?!
translation:
Make sure you bring back the
Hot Spring Water and Bath Salts
from the hot spring in Chrome
Mine, got it?!

original:
Welcome back, ^P!

So you brought back what I asked
this time, right!
Ehehehe, thank you!
This should fix my shoulder!
Here, take this for your troubles!
Thanks again!
translation:
Welcome back, ^P!

So you brought back what I asked
this time, right!
Ehehehe, thank you!
This should fix my shoulder!
Here, take this for your troubles!
Thanks again!

original:
Handed over Key Item
Hot Spring Water
translation:
Handed over Key Item
Hot Spring Water

original:
Handed over Key Item
Bath Salts
translation:
Handed over Key Item
Bath Salts

original:
You really are a reliable Tamer!

If you ever want to go to the hot
springs, let me know!
translation:
You really are a reliable Tamer!

If you ever want to go to the hot
springs, let me know!

original:
Hot spring...? Well, the water is
always steaming hot...
It's out back...
Maybe try telling her that...?
translation:
Hot spring...? Well, the water is
always steaming hot...
It's out back...
Maybe try telling her that...?

original: Hurry and go!
translation: Hurry and go!

original:
You're back again? If you want
more water, you can have more.
The Bath Salts are just on the 
other side of this door, hurry now!
translation:
You're back again? If you want
more water, you can have more.
The Bath Salts are just on the 
other side of this door, hurry now!
